page.title: 14Animals in Sigglesthorne
page.content: Animals in Sigglesthorne are mainly{farming}animals and{domestic pets. A few people in this area keep {chickens,geese}etc...on smallholdings. A lot of people in Sigglesthorne keep{cats}and{dogs}or{goldfish.}Some people have{gerbils}or{hamsters.}Some people keep{horses}and{ponies}for riding and show jumping. Most animals in the area are farming animals like{cows,}mainly Freisian,Charolais, Limosin and Herefords. There are also some{goats and two intensive{pig}rearing units. In the area there are wild animals like{rabbits,foxes}and{rats but no wolves. Wild{deer}have been seen in the area; they have escaped from Wassand Hall. Many{birds}can be seen in the area such as wood pigeon, rooks, starlings, crows, and sparrows, etc.Small{mammals}are frequently seen.
